name: Zahraaa
wishText: Hope your thesis goes well and you can graduate soon. I'm waiting in November :)
textInChatBox: Selamat ulang tahun! Semoga panjang umur, blablabla...
text2: That's what I was going to do
text3: But it's too boring (dan bukan Diky banget)
text4: So, I wanted to do something IT-er and a bit more
outroText: Gimana keren ga si? Ditunggu review-nya di WA
replayText: Klik sini kalo mau nonton lagi
